title: How RAG Architecture Overcomes LLM Limitations
author: Naren Narendran
description: Retrieval-augmented generation facilitates a radical makeover of LLMs and real-time AI environments to produce better, more accurate search results.
cntitle: RAG 架构如何克服 LLM 的局限性
cndescription: 检索增强生成促进了 LLM 和实时 AI 环境的彻底改造，以产生更好、更准确的搜索结果。
